text:
-ShkrA#mataq-stasmAqt prA~jcauq yantauq na pa#Syanti praqtya~jcA#vAqvRutya# juhutaqstasmA$t praqtya~jcauq yantau# paSyantiq cakShu#ShIq vA EqtE yaqj~jasyaq yacCuqkrAmaqnthinauq nAsi#kOttaravEqdiraqBita#H pariqkramya# juhutaqstasmA#daqBitOq nAsi#kAqM cakShu#ShIq tasmAqnnAsi#kayAq cakShu#ShIq vidhRu#tE saqrvataqH pari# 
krAmatOq rakSha#sAqmapa#hatyai dEqvA vai yAH prAcIqrAhu#tIqraju#havuqryE puqrastAqdasu#rAq Asaqn tA(gg)stABiqH prA- [  ] 44
